examples: He claimed that the middle class would bear the brunt of the tax increase.

examples: This book starts off detailing a lot of the work by Carl Akeley who was arguably the father of modern taxidermy today and the one responsible for creating the animals that go into the dioramas at the American Natural History Museum in New York

words.defineEn: a picture (or series of pictures) representing a continuous scene

examples: Not wearing a helmet while riding a bicycle is asking for an injury and can increase the likelihood of a head injury.
Skipping breakfast before an exam is asking for trouble and can increase the likelihood of poor performance.
Procrastinating on a project until the last minute is asking for stress and can increase the likelihood of a poor outcome.
Ignoring warning signs of a heart attack and continuing to smoke and eat unhealthy foods is asking for a heart attack and can increase the likelihood of serious health problems.
The likelihood is no.
words.defineEn: the probability of a specified outcome
words.defineVi: xác suất của một kết quả cụ thể

examples: Right so part of the Kansas problem was that hundreds of so called border ruffians flocked to Kansas from pro-slavery Missouri to cast ballots in Kansas elections, which led to people coming in from free states and setting up their own rival governments.

examples: Consider the hydra.

examples: At this point in the movie, the king and queen and their retinue have arrived, and they're staying at Downton.

examples: Defenders of the test agree that grades are important but they also argue that it's better to have more information about an applicant especially considering that grade inflation is a lot more common in some high schools than others but with the standardized test, everyone's taking the same thing and is scored the exact same way and the testing industry claimed that the test are continually evolving to better measure relevant skills and test that students are actually learning in high school rather than whether they can remember the definition of legerdemain and perspicacity.

examples: They were displaced not just from Rondo, but from the middle class, says civil rights attorney Artika Tyner, a fifth-generation daughter of Rondo.

examples: It gave you some ballast.

this is when the true test of your mettle happens.
